entry.title: First post
entry.content:
I work with data. In daytime, I provide my modelling and (basic) IT skills to a hedge fund. After work, my interests include swimming, indoor rock climbing and reading. I practise swimming for 20 years, and received strict training when I was a child. In terms of reading, luckily, having a thorough knowledge structure of statistical learning and absorbing it into my brain model is not only my personal interests, it also benefits my work. So, in some extent, my hobbies allow me to do that for a living.

“Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.”

To perform like a pro, there are many to learn. A quant should be a full stack engineer with the knowledge of mathematics, statistics, and computer science.

I decide to start a blog, to record my ideas and progress, life is a marathon, if I do not break it down into several TODOs, . Moreover, to organise my thoughts.

I am interested in several aspects:

  • trading strategy (methodology)
  • linear model (sparse)
  • high dimensional statistics
  • cryptocurrency trading bot

To be continue…
